full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA SKYABS SU 'GRO BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU DANG, DGE SLONG GZHAN DAG KYANG BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA SKYABS SU 'GRO BA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SARBA DZNYA DE BA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BANDE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA, ,
